title: Stove Knob Covers for Child Safety, WeGuard 5 Pack Baby Proof Oven Door Lock & Clear Gas Stove Knob Covers for Kids Toddler, Baby Safety Kit No Tools Need or Drill
features: Prevent children or pets from turn on the oven or playing with the stove knob.
Made of PC material, resistant to heat and abrasion, robust and durable.
Transparent appearance, so you can easily see the status of the stove knobs.
Fits gas ranges and oven knobs with an inside diameter of less than 2.48 inches.
Easy to install, no screws or drills.
description: 4 Pack Stove Knob Covers + 1 Pack Oven Locks is designed to prevent little hands from opening the oven and getting hurt or burned; keeping little ones out of kitchen accidents. 【WHY NEED IT】 - kids love to have adventure at home, but fire is very dangerous even for adults; The safety oven knob cover kit can prevent your kids from turning on flame or playing with the stove knob, keeping your kids stay safe at home. 【Double Button Design + Transparent Appearance】 - Open the two buttons at the same time, it is difficult for children, easy for adults. Transparent appearance can be easily integrated into a variety of styles of decoration, will not attract the attention of the baby. 【PC Material (Clear & Heat-Resistan)】 - Made of high quality PC material and resistance to high temperature of 248℉, please feel relieved to use. 【Application Range】 - Our childproofing oven guards are compatible with most oven models and microwaves.The inner diameter of the gas stove knob cover is approx 2.6 inch, the height is approx 2 inch, and the bottom hole diameter is 1.26 inch. Fits gas ranges and oven knobs with an inside diameter of less than 2.3 inch. 【No Tools Needed】 - The back side comes with a strong adhesive. Install the stove knob cover with Adhesive, adhesive with strong viscous (Effect will be better after 24 hours.) and can be removed easily without any residual, no harm to the stove. 【Installation Method】: 1.Confirm the location where the product is to be installed. You can test the position in the locked state. 2.Wipe clean with a dry cloth on the part to be installed. 3. Stick the product in a suitable position. 4. The effect will be better after 24 hours of pasting. Specification: Color: white / transparent Size: Oven Door Locks 2.6*2.6*2in Stove Knob Covers - External dimensions 2.6 inch, Inner diameter2.3inch Weight: 215g Material: ABS
